name: bgxpress
summary: bgxpress helps iOS apps work with Silicon Labs Serial to BLE bridges BGX13P Bluetooth 5 PCB Module and BGX13S Bluetooth 5 SiP Module.
description:
bgxpress is an iOS framework for interoperation with Silicon Labs Serial to BLE bridge parts,
BGX13P Bluetooth 5 PCB Module and BGX13S Bluetooth 5 SiP Module. These parts would be useful
to add BLE support for an electronic design having a serial data connection. bgxpress allows
iOS apps to be written to interoperate with these products. It allows the iOS app to discover,
connect, control, communicate, and update the firmware on these modules.
